definition: in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
rebellion against the Qing of 1670s, pacified by Kangxi

sentences.english: Satan and the rebel angels have been roundly defeated.
sentences.chinese: 撒旦和叛乱天使们被彻底击败了。

sentences.english: At last the rebellion was crushed down.
Pictures of insurgents firing an anti-aircraft missile in Iraq .
sentences.chinese: 有关伊拉克叛乱分子发射防空导弹的录像。

sentences.english: Vendean Rebellion was a significant event during the French Revolution.
sentences.chinese: “旺代叛乱”是法国大革命中的一个重大事件。

sentences.english: They sowed rebellion broadcast in our army.
sentences.chinese: 他们在我们的部队中煽动叛乱。

sentences.english: The Warrior then rebel, raises the civil war.
sentences.chinese: 武士则发动叛乱，引发内战。

sentences.english: But he said insurgent leaders have been able to take refuge in Pakistan.
sentences.chinese: 同时他还声明叛乱领导人将在巴基斯坦避难。

sentences.english: Leading troops, he quelled a rebellion.
sentences.chinese: 他带领军队平息了一场叛乱。

sentences.english: During Pugachev’s uprising the plant was again ravaged and destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 在普加乔夫的叛乱期间，工厂再次遭到摧毁和破坏。

sentences.english: In the end of 1956, Outside Islands Rebellion broke.
sentences.chinese: 1956年末，印度尼西亚爆发外岛叛乱。

sentences.english: The newly-occupied Italian colony of Libya rose in revolt in 1914.
sentences.chinese: 意大利新占领的殖民地利比亚于1914年发生叛乱。

sentences.english: The rebels went looting and pillaging.
sentences.chinese: 叛乱者趁火打劫，掠夺财物。

sentences.english: The rebels went on an orgy of killing and destruction.
sentences.chinese: 叛乱者杀人破坏，肆意妄为。

sentences.english: Ancona now starts as a rebel region.
sentences.chinese: 安科纳现在起始是叛乱地区。

sentences.english: Any counterinsurgency campaign, we’re told, requires a very long commitment.
sentences.chinese: 我们被告知，任何反叛乱运动都需要长期的承诺。

sentences.english: Before long the pla suppressed the armed rebellion in shanna n where the rebels had been entrenched for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 以后又平息了叛乱分子长期盘踞的山南地区的叛乱。
